data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 81 believers in Herceg Novi and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Herceg Novi, Montenegro
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Herceg Novi, Montenegro to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 30,420 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 376 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 6 new simple churches in the state of Herceg Novi, Montenegro. Place a simple church in every community of the 30,500 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Herceg Novi, Montenegro so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Turk people.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Herceg Novi, Montenegro.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 81 believers in Herceg Novi to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 30,420 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Herceg Novi, Montenegro into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
